definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control

sentences.english: The flow resistance device is a important unit for achieving electron beam welding in partial vacuum.
sentences.chinese: 气阻装置是实现低真空电子束焊接的重要部件。

sentences.english: To reconstruct the 3-dimensioanal image of heart and the region of myocardial ischemia from 2-dimensioanal tomogram of electron beam CT (EBCT).
sentences.chinese: 研究电子束CT心肌梗死部位及形态的三维图象重建。

sentences.english: The corresponding electric currents are used to deflect an electron beam in a cathode-ray tube.
sentences.chinese: 相应的电流就用来使阴极射线管里的电子束偏转。

sentences.english: A new type high accuracy high voltage D. C. power supply used for electron beam exposure sysfem is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一种电子束曝光机用新型精密高压电源。

sentences.english: This paper investigated whether clenbuterol degradation would take place when clenbuterol aqueous solution was irradiated by electronic beam.
sentences.chinese: 克伦特罗水溶液在电子束辐照下将发生降解。

sentences.english: Nanolithography technology is one of the main areas of nanostructure research.
sentences.chinese: 电子束曝光机是纳米构图技术的重要途径之一。

sentences.english: The electron beams work by interfering with microorganism DNA.
sentences.chinese: 电子束通过干扰微生物DNA从而发挥作用。

sentences.english: Approaching higher resolution is the critical issue for electron-beam lithography.
sentences.chinese: 追求更高的分辨率是电子束曝光研究的核心内容。

sentences.english: The proximity effect in the E-beam lithography system was verified by experiments.
sentences.chinese: 利用电子束曝光机完成有关邻近效应的实验。

sentences.english: The ultrasonic C-scan testing method is used in detecting electron beam welding( EBW) seam.
sentences.chinese: 采用超声C扫描技术检测结构件的电子束焊焊缝。

sentences.english: This paper describes a new heating cathode source for electronic beam welder (EBW).
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种新型的电子束焊机用阴极加热电源。

sentences.english: So rather than calling this an electron beam, this was called a cathode ray.
sentences.chinese: 因此我们最好别叫它电子束，而是阴极射线。

sentences.english: This paper is intended to introduce the principle and clinical applications of EBT.
sentences.chinese: 本文就电子束CT的原理和临床应用作一介绍。

sentences.english: The beam is bounced of the surface, mapping out perfectly its tiny features.
sentences.chinese: 电子束在其表面反弹，完美展现出它的微小容貌。

sentences.english: This paper introduces rapidly controlling principle on electron beam current for electron beam welder(EBW).
sentences.chinese: 介绍了电子束焊机用电子束流快速控制原理。

definition: crystal lattice (the regular 3-dimensional pattern formed by atoms in a crystal)
